original_text: Can anyone rob a brave soldier? Can anyone rescue prisoners from a cruel ruler?’ Can anyone rob a brave soldier?
korean_text: 용사가 빼앗은 것을 어떻게 도로 빼앗으며 승리자에게 사로잡힌 자를 어떻게 건져낼 수 있으랴

sentences.original_text: Can anyone rob a brave soldier?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 용맹한 군인을 약탈할 수 있겠는가?

sentences.original_text: Can anyone rob a brave soldier?
